subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: What was looking suspiciously like another lopsided America’s Cup was transformed into a genuine contest, as Emirates Team New Zealand fought back to defeat Alinghi by 28 seconds.
snippet: What was looking suspiciously like another lopsided America’s Cup was transformed into a genuine contest, as Emirates Team New Zealand fought back to defeat Alinghi by 28 seconds.
